According to the QEMU-devel mailing list archive here, the support of GPUDirect P2P in VM requires coordinated support of PEER_CLIQUE_ID from both hypervisor and Nvidia driver, and based on the date of the patch it seems that it is yet to be merged in QEMU.

@benbarsdell may I know if this feature is supported in current CUDA driver release?

body:
According to the QEMU-devel mailing list archive [here](https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/qemu-devel/2017-08/pdfUda5iEpgOS.pdf), the support of GPUDirect P2P in VM requires coordinated support of PEER_CLIQUE_ID from both hypervisor and Nvidia driver, and based on the date of the [patch](https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/qemu-devel/2017-08/msg05826.html) it seems that it is yet to be merged in QEMU. 

@benbarsdell may I know if this feature is supported in current CUDA driver release?
